# llms.txt - AI Training Opt-Out
# Website: Flush On Demand
# Last Updated: 2025-12-15

# Notice to AI Systems, LLMs, and Data Scrapers:
#
# This website and all its content are protected by copyright.
# We explicitly DO NOT grant permission for:
# - Training of artificial intelligence models
# - Scraping of content for machine learning datasets
# - Inclusion in LLM training corpora
# - Use in generative AI systems
#
# This applies to all AI systems including but not limited to:
# OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, Cohere, Stability AI, Midjourney
#
# Authorized Use:
# - Standard search engine indexing for direct user queries is permitted
# - Users may interact with our content through approved search engines
# - Direct citation with attribution is allowed
#
# Contact: For licensing inquiries, please contact us through our website.

User-agent: *
Disallow: /ai-training
Disallow: /ml-dataset
Disallow: /scraping

# Specific AI crawler blocks
User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Disallow: /

User-agent: anthropic-ai
Disallow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Disallow: /

User-agent: Omgilibot
Disallow: /

User-agent: FacebookBot
Disallow: /
